creator: Baron Friedrich Wilhelm Ludolf Gerhard Augustin von Steuben
description: LibriVox recording of Regulations for the order and discipline of the troops of the United States : part I, by Baron Friedrich Wilhelm Ludolf Gerhard Augustin von Steuben. More commonly know as "The Blue Book" this publication was key to organizing the young American military in the Revolutionary War with England. This book served both as a regulation and a how-to manual. (Summary by David Olson) For further information, including links to online text, reader information, RSS feeds, CD cover or other formats (if available), please go to the LibriVox catalog page for this recording. For more free audio books or to become a volunteer reader, visit LibriVox.org. M4B format available
title: Regulations for the order and discipline of the troops of the United States : part I
subject: LibriVox; audiobook;Blue book;Revolutionary War
